exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R H_lim : ex_lim_seq u Unable to unify "ex_lim_seq u" with "ex_finite_lim_seq u".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment u : nat -> R H_not_lim : ~ ex_lim_seq u H : ex_finite_lim_seq u P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball (Lim_seq ?M2597) eps y -> P y" with "match Lim_seq u with | Finite a => locally a P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end".

original: destruct (ex_lim_seq_dec u) as [H_lim | H_not_lim]. - left. apply H_lim. - right. intro H. contradiction H_not_lim. exists (Lim_seq u). apply Lim_seq_correct'.
